response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Our product offers unparalleled value and has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. Considering its exceptional capabilities and the impact it can have on your business, we are extending this offer to you at a special price of $1,350,000.

This is a unique chance to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate, and I am confident that it will prove to be a wise investment for you. Should you choose to accept this offer, we can arrange for immediate delivery and ensure a smooth transition to help you maximize its benefits right away.

Please let me know if you require any further information or assistance in making your decision. We are here to support you every step of the way.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
